title: Inside the Parker - All-Star Game Edition From Coors Field!
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - All-Star Game Edition From Coors Field!
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob is at the MLB All-Star Game in Denver and gives his 3 biggest takeaways from the All-Star Game and the state of the game heading into the second half. He also talks with Rockies Pitcher Taijaun Walker, Blue Jays 2nd Baseman Marcus Semien, O's slugger Cedric Mullins, White Sox SS Tim Anderson, and

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
